dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4729 IH: To codify Executive Order 14292 relating to improving the safety and security of biological research.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Self introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14292 relating to improving the safety and security of biological research.

section.text: Executive Order 14292 (90 Fed. Reg. 19611; relating to improving the safety and security of biological research) shall have the force and effect of law.
